result.eng: Are we in time for the meeting?
result.ga: An bhfuil muid in am don chruinniú
result.orig: An bhfuil muid in am don chruinniú
result.html: An bhfuil muid in am don chruinniúAre we in time for the meeting?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil muid in am don ċruinniúAre we in time for the meeting?

result.html: Beidh cruinniú againn amárachWe'll have a meeting tonmorrow.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ cruinniú againn amáraċWe'll have a meeting tonmorrow.

result.eng: We had a meeting with the new director.
result.ga: Bhí cruinniú againn leis an stiúrthóir nua
result.orig: Bhí cruinniú againn leis an stiúrthóir nua
result.html: Bhí cruinniú againn leis an stiúrthóir nuaWe had a meeting with the new director.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cruinniú againn leis an stiúrṫóir nuaWe had a meeting with the new director.

result.eng: I was attending meetings all day.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag freastal ar chruinnithe an lá ar fad
result.orig: Bhí mé ag freastal ar chruinnithe an lá ar fad
result.html: Bhí mé ag freastal ar chruinnithe an lá ar fadI was attending meetings all day.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag freastal ar ċruinniṫe an lá ar fadI was attending meetings all day.

result.eng: There were hundreds of people at the public meeting.
result.ga: Bhí na céadta daoine ag an chruinniú poiblí
result.orig: Bhí na céadta daoine ag an chruinniú poiblí
result.html: Bhí na céadta daoine ag an chruinniú poiblíThere were hundreds of people at the public meeting.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na céadta daoine ag an ċruinniú poiblíThere were hundreds of people at the public meeting.

result.eng: He always took the lead when there was a meeting.
result.ga: Bhíodh sé i gcónaí ar thús cadhnaíochta nuair a bhíodh cruinniú ar siúl
result.orig: Bhíodh sé i gcónaí ar thús cadhnaíochta nuair a bhíodh cruinniú ar siúl
result.html: Bhíodh sé i gcónaí ar thús cadhnaíochta nuair a bhíodh cruinniú ar siúlHe always took the lead when there was a meeting.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoḋ sé i gcónaí ar ṫús caḋnaíoċta nuair a ḃíoḋ cruinniú ar siúlHe always took the lead when there was a meeting.

result.eng: The governors' board is having a meeting.
result.ga: Tá bord na ngobharnóirí i mbun cruinnithe
result.orig: Tá bord na ngobharnóirí i mbun cruinnithe
result.html: Tá bord na ngobharnóirí i mbun cruinnitheThe governors' board is having a meeting.
result.ponchtml: Tá bord na ngoḃarnóirí i mbun cruinniṫeThe governors' board is having a meeting.

result.eng: What dod you do after the meeting?
result.ga: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaidh an chruinnithe
result.orig: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaidh an chruinnithe
result.html: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaidh an chruinnitheWhat dod you do after the meeting?
result.ponchtml: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaiḋ an ċruinniṫeWhat dod you do after the meeting?

result.ga: Cén t-am a thosaigh an cruinniú
result.orig: Cén t-am a thosaigh an cruinniú
result.html: Cén t-am a thosaigh an cruinniúWhen did the meeting start?
result.ponchtml: Cén t-am a ṫosaiġ an cruinniúWhen did the meeting start?

result.eng: I haven't managed to escape from the meeting.
result.ga: Níor éirigh liom éalú ón chruinniú
result.orig: Níor éirigh liom éalú ón chruinniú
result.html: Níor éirigh liom éalú ón chruinniúI haven't managed to escape from the meeting.
result.ponchtml: Níor éiriġ liom éalú ón ċruinniúI haven't managed to escape from the meeting.

result.eng: The matter was discussed at a meeting of the council.
result.ga: Pléadh an cheist ag cruinniú na comhairle
result.orig: Pléadh an cheist ag cruinniú na comhairle
result.html: Pléadh an cheist ag cruinniú na comhairleThe matter was discussed at a meeting of the council.
result.ponchtml: Pléaḋ an ċeist ag cruinniú na coṁairleThe matter was discussed at a meeting of the council.

result.eng: These are the documents for the meeting.
result.ga: Seo iad na cáipéisí faoi choinne an chruinnithe
result.orig: Seo iad na cáipéisí faoi choinne an chruinnithe
result.html: Seo iad na cáipéisí faoi choinne an chruinnitheThese are the documents for the meeting.
result.ponchtml: Seo iad na cáipéisí faoi ċoinne an ċruinniṫeThese are the documents for the meeting.

result.eng: The meeting sucked all my energy out of me.
result.ga: Shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asam
result.orig: Shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asam
result.html: Shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asamThe meeting sucked all my energy out of me.
result.ponchtml: Ṡúiġ an cruinniú an fuinneaṁ ar fad asamThe meeting sucked all my energy out of me.

result.eng: The director is attending a meeting at the moment.
result.ga: Tá an stiúrthóir ag freastal ar chruinniú faoi láthair
result.orig: Tá an stiúrthóir ag freastal ar chruinniú faoi láthair
result.html: Tá an stiúrthóir ag freastal ar chruinniú faoi láthairThe director is attending a meeting at the moment.
result.ponchtml: Tá an stiúrṫóir ag freastal ar ċruinniú faoi láṫairThe director is attending a meeting at the moment.

result.eng: An interesting question was raised in the meeting.
result.html: Tógadh ceist shuimiúil sa chruinniúAn interesting question was raised in the meeting.
result.ponchtml: Tógaḋ ceist ẛuimiúil sa ċruinniúAn interesting question was raised in the meeting.

result.eng: I am coming to the meeting.
result.ga: Tá mé ag teacht chuig an gcruinniú
result.orig: Tá mé ag teacht chuig an gcruinniú
result.html: Tá mé ag teacht chuig an gcruinniúI am coming to the meeting.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag teaċt ċuig an gcruinniúI am coming to the meeting.

result.eng: Instead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ga: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.orig: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.html: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ponchtml: In áit a ḃeiṫ ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleaḋ cibé a ḃí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.

result.eng: She'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ga: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.orig: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.html: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ponchtml: B'ḟada i dteaċ na mboċt nó ag cruinniú na déirce í aċ go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
